name: Cosmic Crotch Thrusters
description:
a chaotic local-multiplayer arena fighter set in an intergalactic gladiatorial tournament. The game includes two game modes deathmatch and team deathmatch and combat features power-ups, dash and parries.

Requires gamepads to play and works with most types(Xbox , PS4 etc.)

2-4 Players.

Team:

  • Thoki Sibanda - Systems Programming, UI, Sound
  • Daniel Hartwell - Art, Animation
  • Tofique Rawoot - VFX, Integration
  • Phatho Pukwana - Gameplay Programming, Animation
